1.phrase: If you can dream it, you can do it.
1.author: Walt Disney

4.phrase: There is always room at the top.
4.author: Daniel Webster

6.phrase: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
6.author: Carol Burnett

7.phrase: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
7.author: George Sand

8.phrase: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
8.author: Cesare Pavese

10.phrase: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
10.author: John Ray

12.phrase: When love is not madness, it is not love.
12.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

13.phrase: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
13.author: Dalai Lama

14.phrase: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
14.author: Scott Hamilton

15.phrase: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
15.author: Muhammad Ali

16.phrase: To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing, be nothing.
16.author: Elbert Hubbard

17.phrase: It’s not what you look at that matters, it’s what you see.
17.author: Henry David Thoreau

18.phrase: Our life always expresses the result of our dominant thoughts.
18.author: Soren Kierkegaard

20.phrase: Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional.
20.author: M. Kathleen Casey

22.phrase: Don’t cry because it’s over. Smile because it happened.
22.author: Dr. Seuss

23.phrase: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
23.author: Milton Berle

25.phrase: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
25.author: Alan Kay
